body.name: Swiss Madison Well Made Forever SM-1T113 Voltaire One Piece Elongated Toilet Dual Flush 0.8/1.28 GPF, White

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Swiss Madison Well Made Forever Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 21 hrs 56 mins
features: Dual flush with high-performance gravity 0. 8 / 1. 28 gallon per flush (gpf)
Skirted trap way, for easy cleaning
Soft Closing Seat closes gently and quietly
Side holes offer easy access to the floor bolts for installation.
body.description: The Voltaire one-piece toilet offers a sleek eye-appealing design, while still practical, for easy cleaning. The elongated and comfort height bowl makes for a relaxing experience. The top mounted dual flush will save significant amounts of water annually allowing you to be fiscally and environmentally conscious without sacrificing performance.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.1 3.1 out of 5 stars 19 ratings 3.1 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #724,162 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #281 in One-Piece Toilets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and so worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: The company Swiss Madison was one of the finest company's I have dealt with in a very long time. Someone actually answered the phone and handled my issue immediately. It is a beautiful toilet that looks stunning. My only complaint is it's a very hard toilet to install. If you are use to putting in two piece toilets there is no comparison. It is very heavy and you can not see the bolts to line up the holes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking but some issues
reviews.reviewText: I ordered one of these toilets from Home Depot for my master bathroom and it was great. No problems. Easy installation, no problems. Then, comes my guest bathroom renovation. I ordered this toilet from Amazon, thinking it would be the same. Not so much. My plumber spent 3-4 hours trying to figure out why it was leaking during installation. We concluded that that specific toilet was defective. I ordered another one. Same thing happened. As it turns out, there were small fractures on the bottom of both toilets that had been very shoddily repaired. That's where the leaks were coming from. These toilet are definitely refurbished and did not come straight from the factory. My advice is not to order this product from Amazon. The actual product is great but get it from Home Depot or somewhere else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service, beautiful toilet
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toilet and i am very happy with it , is gorgeous and elegant , but what really set this seller apart is the great customer service and fast response. Very happy with my purchase ...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: We have now tried to install this toilet 3 times, replaced the ring and bolts multiple times and it leaks. There are small cracks that must have happened in shipping or manufacture- don’t waste your money, time or effort. Now trying to figure out how to return it for our refund, what a disaster

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It arrived cracked
reviews.reviewText: Loved the toilet. Paid $250.00 to have it installed . Due to the nature of one piece toilets like this plumbers will up charge for installation as it takes twice as long. Toilet leaked after about an hour it was in. Had to call back plumber next day. We discovered a hair line crack under bowl. Had to run to Home Depot, lug home a basic toilet and call plumber back. Ups guy said he takes toilets and mirrors back all day long. Don’t ever order a toilet to be delivered he said. They always crack! I think the one piece idea is the issue. The pressure is on the area where it connects and with shipping it’s too much for it. Lesson learned. But now I’m out $200.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: A nice heavy toilet flushes well! Looks nice. we ordered two of them at separate times and both came in with the lids broken ! Something needs to be packaged better. Still waiting on replacement lids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this toilet!
reviews.reviewText: The product was well on time ( I believe ahead of schedule), and it is everything the vendor proclaimed! It look's great, and it's comfortable too! Thank you for a wonderful toilet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY!
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: The seller still refuses to offer a refund on the toilets, they take zero accountability for the product the are selling. I have filed a claim against them with the Better Business Bureau to resolve.We purchased 3 tiolets for our new home. We have had nothing but issues with all three. They do not produce enough water in the bowl or the tank to carry paper to the main sewer line. We worked with the manufacturer to adjust the water & flush levels and still have the same issue. We have spent thousands of dollars in plumbing to clear blockages. The seller will not offer us a refund. The manufacturer wants to send us 3 more toilets, why would we want replacements when the product is junk. Very frustrating. Do not buy these, the seller puts all the blame elsewhere instead of taking ownership in a product they are selling on Amazon.
